column9: Love it especially when accounts are funny or relatable
It helps you discover new brands that can be good. But some could be fake or very bad quality. But i think brands on social media is good because it gives them a space to express their brand
I think it's cool that I can see updates from the brand

I don't mind them if they're a trusted and already well known brand. I won't follow their accounts (unless they're something small and interesting like artisan jewelry or artistic in that way) but I will still see their ads either being shared by friends (promotional offers) or promoted posts. In relation to small brands, I tend not to trust the ones that don't have a social media or ones that do don't have an accompanying website with details of where they are headquartered and some information about where their stock comes from.
It helps a lot with advertising
It’s very good marketing as I’ve bought items I never planned to just because it popped up in my face and I liked it
Fine, I like seeing new products and i don’t mind advertisements at all
I like brands having social media to research them, see their content and may make me want to purchase from them in the future
